text: Ursula Kraus (2 August 1930 - 2 August 2021) was a German politician. She was born in Neunkirchen, Saarland. She was a member of the Social Democratic Party. Between 1984 until 1996, Kraus was Mayor of Wuppertal. She was also a member of the Landtag of North Rhine-Westphalia from 1984 until 1990. Kraus died on her 91st birthday on 2 August 2021 in Wuppertal.Trauer um Alt- Oberb√ºrgermeisterin Ursula Kraus ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German mayors Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Politicians from Saarland Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
